detectors.description:
TokenlonUtilityToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#54-66) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(_val <= holders[_from]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#58)
	- assert(bool)(_val <= approach[_from][msg.sender]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#60)
	- assert(bool)(holders[_to] >= _val) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#63)

TokenlonUtilityToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#33-35) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- revert()() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenlonUtilityToken.sol#34)
